Synopsis: Updates an OAI message by sending a POST request to the specified thread and message IDs.
Description: The Update-OAIMessage function updates an OAI message by sending a POST request to the specified thread and message IDs. It allows you to update the metadata of a message.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Update-OAIMessage -ThreadId 1234 -MessageId 5678 -Metadata @{ "key" = "value" }
Updates the message with ID 5678 in the thread with ID 1234, setting the metadata to {"key": "value"}.
